Class ReusableFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ReusableStream<java.io.FileInputStream>

    public class ReusableFileInputStream
extends ReusableInputStream<java.io.File,java.io.FileInputStream>
    The File implementation for ReusableInputStream.

    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin
